definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
arc length/length of a curve segment

sentences.english: Two golden curves across the card surface add an artistic touch to the design.
sentences.chinese: 另外卡面設計以兩道金色弧線爲主題，極富藝術感。

sentences.english: From there, the Spain striker curled a shot into the top corner of the net.
sentences.chinese: 就在那裏，西班牙前鋒的一個弧線球直搗球網的上方。

sentences.english: Shorrock took the penalty kick making the ball swerve into the top right-hand corner of the net.
sentences.chinese: 罰點球時，肖羅克一個弧線球將球踢進右上角。

sentences.english: The arc of my upward mobility has come with a Faustian downside.
sentences.chinese: 我的向上流動的弧線拿出一個浮士德式的缺點。

sentences.english: It flutters off in a descending spiral, the shoulder of one wing hacked open.
sentences.chinese: 刀划着螺旋形下降弧線，砍開一隻斑溪的的肩膀。

sentences.english: The curve ball is also called arc line ball.
Magnification of one segment of the arc with the magnifying power of 500x.
sentences.chinese: 切割弧線的局部放大圖，放大倍率爲500倍。

sentences.english: To be under arms stroking with lumbar rotation curve is still going.
sentences.chinese: 兩臂下捋須隨腰旋轉，仍走弧線。

sentences.english: Want to experience the "curveball illusion" without stepping up to the plate?
sentences.chinese: 想要體驗“弧線球幻覺”，無需接受挑戰？

sentences.english: The ball arced gloriously past the full-back, over Luiz and Cech's out-stretched hand.
sentences.chinese: 球美妙的弧線繞過了魯伊茲和伸展開雙手的切赫。

sentences.english: That summer, plane across the sea, delimit next smile curve.
sentences.chinese: 那年夏天，飛機越過海面，劃下微笑弧線。

sentences.english: The toothed slide block is provided with an arc-shaped groove.
sentences.chinese: 帶齒滑塊上制有弧線形槽。

sentences.english: The arc under the Bishop's Chambers.
sentences.chinese: 在主教處所下方的弧線。

sentences.english: Drag to add an arc with adjustable size and orientation.
sentences.chinese: 拖動此形狀，可添加一條大小和方向可調的弧線。

sentences.english: This is an arc, not unlike this one.
The way they are curved allows you to keep the plate in one hand while eating the food with the other one.
sentences.chinese: 這種弧線可以讓你一隻手握着盤子，另一隻手喫東西。

definition: to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
perfectly round/(fig.) accommodating/considerate/smooth (way of doing things)
